about_the_game:
The Trip is a psychedelic adventure set in an open world. Your journey begins as Sam a young Fundi who lives a humble life in the Fundis Capital, Sam is confronted with the larger world beyond the city he knows, as he sets out on this Trip into the unknown he overcomes challenges, fights the Avidas Military Units, helps fellow Fundis on the psychedelic adventure of a lifetime!

Explore vibrant, ever-changing worlds, where each discovery leads to mind-bending challenges, strange characters, and hidden secrets. Every quest is a unique trip, designed to push your perceptions and uncover deeper truths.

content_descriptors.notes: The Trip features mature content that may not be suitable for all audiences. The game includes depictions of psychedelic experiences, which can involve intense visual and auditory effects, themes of altered consciousness, and surreal or unsettling imagery. There are also themes of introspection that touch on mental health and existential questions. While the game does not include explicit sexual content or graphic violence, some scenes may evoke feelings of disorientation, fear, or anxiety, particularly during darker segments of the player's journey. Players sensitive to topics related to mental health, drug use, or intense psychological experiences should take caution.
